original:
The French Lichenological Society (Société Française de Lichénologie) is dedicated to the study and promotion of lichenology, the branch of biology concerned with lichens. This organization plays a pivotal role in advancing research and education related to these unique organisms.



The Society provides a comprehensive guide on using a lichen-based index to assess nitrogen levels in air quality. This index serves as a valuable tool for
